body_html:
Thank you
accord to the discussion ：https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/convert-import-torch-model-to-pytorch/37/6
I solved it by the code below:

encZ.modules[12] = nn.View(1,4096)

As you said
(12): nn.View(-1)
cause the error.'assert input.dim() == 2'

Thank you very much @soumith
body_text:
Thank you
accord to the discussion ：https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/convert-import-torch-model-to-pytorch/37/6

body:
Thank you
accord to the discussion ：https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/convert-import-torch-model-to-pytorch/37/6
I solved it by the code below:

encZ.modules[12] = nn.View(1,4096)

As you said 
(12): nn.View(-1)
cause the error.'assert input.dim() == 2'


Thank you very much @soumith
